name: Elphame Demo
description:
Take a step into the world of Elphame, a mysterious world where beasties rule the four lands.

In Elphame, you take on the role of Darren, a hot-blooded fighter, Nora, a wise spellcaster, Raven, a mysterious assassin or Jack, an eccentric thief.

You must study the skills of your opponents and plan your skills of pyromancy, hydromancy, necromancy and ferromancy around their strategy.

Featuring art by Michael Smyth!

www.discoreptile.net
